articles.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
articles.title: Rivian is the latest EV maker to adopt Tesla's charging standard - The Verge
articles.description: Rivian announced it would adopt Tesla’s North American Charging Standard, giving the company’s customers access to thousands of Supercharger stations.
articles.content:
Rivian is the latest EV maker to adopt Teslas charging standard
Rivian is the latest EV maker to adopt Teslas charging standard
 / Starting in 2025, Rivians R1T and R1S will come with Teslas North … [+3547 chars]
